0.0.2.title: Bug and stability fixes
feature_list: Always load supported rooms from GitHub
Fix RPC not updating when a instance gets full or a game starts or ends

0.0.3.title: Cleaning up
feature_list: Included alt username slot on env
Cleaned up the main directory of the program

0.0.4.title: Prompting
feature_list: The script doesn't automatically close now whenever it runs to an issue.
